name: Kappa Drop
description:
Kappa Drop is a Gameboy game created using C and the GBDK library. The general idea was to create a simple GameBoy game that could be added as a minigame to later projects or as a standalone game. This is my first attempt at using GBDK and game design in general.

The game can be played on an emulator or a real GameBoy utilizing a flashcart.

How to Play

Controls

-Left: Move character left

-Right: Move character right

-Enter: Start (For menus)

Instructions

Move the Kappa to catch the falling items with their basket. Each movement causes the Kappa to spill some of the water in his head, so don't make any unnecessary movements! How high can you get before your health runs out?
